goal.ch:
“一、了解儀器分析的基本運作原理。
二、學習各種化學儀器的定量、定性原理。
三、研討各種儀器的應用與限制。“
goal.en:
“1. understand the basic principles of various instruments.
2. study the theories of quantitative and qualitative analysis.
3. study the applications and limitations of chemical instrumentations.“

outline.ch:
“一、了解儀器分析的基本運作原理。
二、學習各種化學儀器的定量、定性原理。
三、研討各種儀器的應用與限制。“
outline.en: “This course is intended for seniors major in chemistry, who has completed the learning of basic analytical chemistry. This course covers atomic spectrometry, molecular spectrometry, mass spectrometry, electroanalytical methods including potentiometry and voltammetry. In addition, surface analysis represents a field that has been overlooked by many other institutes. this subject would be taught as well.“

textbook.ch:
“儀器分析原理(Princiles of instrumental analysis (6th ed.) by Skoog, Holler and Crouch)

歐亞書局 02-8912-1188“
textbook.en:
“Princiles of instrumental analysis (6th ed.) by Skoog, Holler and Crouch

Order information: Eurasia Books Co. Tel = 02-8912-1188“

gradMethod.en: “three major exams and quiz, whose weights would be divided evenly.“

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
